title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning Enhancement Course in Technology-Enhanced Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans using Personal Learning Environment (PLE) tools.
Learners can develop a psychological sense of ownership toward the learning process in digital device-based environments.
Learners can complete social domain practical projects by applying self-regulated learning strategies in technology-enhanced environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
